title: Minnie Driver
itunes:title: Minnie Driver
itunes:subtitle: Minnie Driver [Good Will Hunting, The Phantom of the Opera, Grosse Pointe Blank, Sleepers, I Give it a Year] talks with Anna about fame, humility, surfing, surprise tea parties, inspirational poetry, bad relationships, great relationships, running from th
description:
Minnie Driver [Good Will Hunting, The Phantom of the Opera, Grosse Pointe Blank, Sleepers, I Give it a Year] talks with Anna about fame, humility, surfing, surprise tea parties, inspirational poetry, bad relationships, great relationships, running from the law, home birth, cucumber sandwiches, and much more. Later in the episode Anna and April talk with a listener whose partner’s anger management issues force her to question their relationship.

Learn more about April and LEVEL by visiting www.levelconnections.com

Order Dealbreakers now. On sale wherever books are sold.

European Wax Center Visit waxcenter.com to book your reservation today and check out the new line of products — remember, your first wax is free!

Maker's Mark So no matter what your day-to-day looks like, you still need your YOU time to be...well, for you. Join me in reclaiming 6 – 7 p.m. as The Happiest Hour so you can do whatever it is that makes you happy. And if that involves a glass of bourbon, remember - Maker’s Mark crafts their bourbon carefully, and they ask that you enjoy it that way. Maker’s Mark Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whisky, forty five percent alcohol by volume. Copyright Twenty Twenty-One Maker’s Mark Distillery Incorporated, Loretto, Kentucky.

McDonald's McDonald’s Quarter Pounder with Cheese... just talking about this is making me crave it. Fresh Beef available at most restaurants in contiguous US. Not available in Alaska, Hawaii, and US Territories.

BetterHelp As we begin to see light at the end of the Covid tunnel, a lot of people are still feeling down and emotionally out of sorts • You may not feel depressed or at a total loss. But if you’re feeling a little bit off or your relationships are suffering, that could be a sign you should talk to somebody. Online therapy can help.  Our listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/FARIS

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Instagram @Unqualified
Twitter @Unqualified
Facebook @Anna Faris is Unqualified
Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producers: Michael Barrett, Rob Holysz, Jeph Porter, Kasper Selvig
Researcher: Margot Barrett

Production Services: Rabbit Grin Productions rabbitgrinproductions.com
Distributed by: Simplecast


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
